name: Espurresso
description: Brazilian single bean origin. A mellow yet nutty flavor typical of a dark roast.

name: Salty Carameow
description: Like your coffee a little sweeter? Try this delicious Salty Carameow. Foam, steamed milk, and espresso with caramel syrups.

name: Cold Mew
description: Like your coffee sweet and cold? Try our popular iced cold mew. Milk, ice, drip or espresso, and syrup. Optional foam and drizzle of your choice.

name: Decaff Cat
description: The classic Decaf. No explantion needed.

name: Matcha Kittea
description: Like Matcha? Enjoy this flavorful matcha kittea with sakura!

name: Catcake
description: Choice of Original Glazed, Powder, Chocolate Sprinkle, Cream Filled, Jelly Filled, Boston Cream, Apple Fritter, or Bear Claw

name: Purrista Pawfee
description: Delectable and rich. Choice of Vanilla, Chocolate, Red Velvet, Fresh Strawberry, Maple Pumpkin, or Lemon Blueberry.

name: Danish Pawstry
description: Our beautifully crispy yet soft and buttery pawfee is rolled and baked every morning.

name: Maracrons
description: Artisan-style with a choice of Plain, Everything, Cinnamon Raisin, Blueberry, Chocolate Chip, matcha, taro, mango or Sesame

name: Dairy substitution: Plant Based Milk
description: Oatmilk, Almond milk, Hemp milk, Flax Milk, Soy milk.
